sentence1: Singel was once the outer barrier for the medieval city, but as the city expanded, Herengracht (Gentleman's Canal), Keizersgracht (Emperor's Canal), and Prinsengracht (Princes' Canal) enlarged the web.
sentence1_translated: Singel hapo zamani ilikuwa kizuizi cha nje cha jiji la enzi za kati, lakini jiji lilipopanuka, Herengracht (Mfereji wa Muungwana), Keizersgracht (Mfereji wa Mfalme), na Prinsengracht (Mfereji wa Wakuu) walipanua wavuti.

sentence1: The rugged mountains of the Serra de Tramuntana sweep down to the sea so steeply here that there are few points of access and only one harbor and port of any size along the coast.

sentence1: While statement is better, answer gives the mental picture of completion.
sentence1_translated: Ingawa taarifa ni bora, jibu linatoa picha ya kiakili ya kukamilika.
